item.title: 2025 Holiday Video Game Gift Guide
item.content:encoded:
The Holidays seem to get here faster each year, and we’ve got you covered if you’re looking for some gift ideas for friends and family. This will focus on recent releases. 

Note: All Switch games can be played on a Switch 2. Some games have Switch 2 specific that are usually just upgraded versions 

LEGO Party! 

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch

LEGO Party! is part board game part minigame collection. You control a LEGO character around a game board and compete for Gold Bricks, dueling each other in little minigames between rounds. It's full of that classic LEGO humor, too.

Amazon

Donkey Kong Bananza

Platforms: Nintendo Switch 2 ONLY - WILL NOT WORK ON ORIGINAL SWITCH

Donkey Kong is finally back with a big new game of his own that is all about smashing up the world. It's wonderful and weird, the type of innovation and wackiness that Nintendo is known for.

Amazon

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate 

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch

Play alone or as friends as the titular turtles. What's great about Splintered Fate is that you can play locally together or online with friends. Battle around New York City to save Master Splinter.

Amazon

Hello Kitty Island Adventure

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2

Fans of Animal Crossing will like Hello Kitty Island Adventure, particularly if they like the Sanrio characters. The game plays very similarly and is all about interacting with Hello Kitty and friends.

Amazon

Little Kitty, Big City

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch

In Little Kitty, Big City, you play as a cat who gets into all sorts of hijinks. There are shiny things to collect, phones to steal from people, and birds to pounce on.

Amazon (digital code only)

Disney Illusion Island

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch

Disney Illusion Island is a platformer starring Mickey and friends. There are a lot of cool cooperative actions and mechanics that work best when playing together. You can play solo too, of course.

Amazon

Mario Kart World

Platforms: Nintendo Switch 2 ONLY - WILL NOT WORK ON ORIGINAL SWITCH

Mario Kart World is, well, more Mario Kart. There are a ton of new tracks, new drivers and new suits for their drivers, and there is a big Mario world to drive around in outside of the races.

Amazon

Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2

If you're more of a Sonic fan, Sonic Racing is a great option full of fun racing to be had. This is the newest in the series and has all your favorite Sonic characters and some racers from other popular games like Minecraft, Spongebob, Pac-Man, Mega Man, and more to come in the future.

Amazon

Pokémon Legends: Z-A

Platforms: Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2

Z-A is the newest Pokemon game, though it's a little different from the standard Pokemon games with turn-based battles. Here, you control Pokemon in active fights as they run around the battlefield. 

Amazon

Astro Bot 

Platforms: PlayStation 5

Astro Bot is exclusive to the PlayStation 5, but it is such an amazingly well-made game full of so much charm that anyone should have a blast playing it if they have a PS5. It is a 3D platformer with delights around every corner.

Amazon

Fantasy Video Game Gift Guide 2025 

Monster Hunter Wilds

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

The newest Monster Hunter game, Wilds has you battling giant beasts and monsters in long fights that test your will and skill. The arsenal of weapons to choose from is huge as well, letting you fight however you want.

Amazon

Assassin's Creed Shadows

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2

The latest Assassin's Creed, Shadows takes place in 16th century Japan with two playable characters. One is more the classic assassin as a shinobi, while the other character is about big powerful, slower weapons.

Amazon

The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom

Platforms: Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2

Tears of the Kingdom isn't exactly new, but now is the time to get it if you haven't played. The Switch 2 version is phenomenal, and the game itself is already one of the best of all time. Anyone that is somewhat interested in Zelda will love it.

Amazon

Hollow Knight: Silksong

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2

Silksong was highly anticipated and lived up to what everyone hoped. It's a metroidvania full of well-designed boss fights that will definitely challenge you.

Amazon

Hades II

Platforms: PC, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2

Hades II is a sequel to one of the best games in recent years, and sees you delving deeper beyond the Underworld with the help of Olympian gods. It's fast-paced action that is about trying to get better with every attempt.

Amazon

Ghost of Yotei

Platforms: PlayStation 5

If you're looking for a big epic sweeping story about vengeance, Ghost of Yotei is perfect. Beautiful vistas of Japan and an immersive story wait as you fight samurai to avenge your family.

Amazon

Ninja Gaiden 4 

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

Ninja Gaiden 4 is about fast-paced combat, vicious combos, and a ton of action. A big arsenal and two characters offer a lot of variety to play as you want.

Amazon

Shooters Video Game Gift Guide 2025

Borderlands 4

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

Borderlands 4 is a sprawling shooter that is all about collecting more equipment and the best guns you have. It's full of crude humor and a ton of crazy characters.

Amazon

Battlefield 6

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

Battlefield 6 is one of the premier shooter franchises and the latest entry may be one of the best in a long while. It features huge maps, military vehicle combat, and a ton more. Multiplayer shooter fans will love it.

Amazon

Doom: The Dark Ages 

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

The latest Doom, the over the top action as you fight hoards of demons returns. This time, there is a medieval twist, as you fight demons in castles, add a shield saw to your arsenal, and more.

Amazon

RPG Video Game Gift Guide 2025 

Digimon Story: Time Stranger

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

This is THE game for Digimon fans. It is a well-made RPG, with a great Digimon world and epic story. Even if you're not a Digimon fan, it's a great RPG in its own right.

Amazon

Kingdom Come: Deliverance II

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

A medieval RPG with a focus on realism and historical accuracy, Kingdom Come: Deliverance II is a sweeping story of revenge. It's grand and personal, with authentic flourishes of medieval Europe.

Amazon

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5,  Xbox Series X|S

No other game made a bigger splash this year as Expedition 33. It is a turn-based RPG with French influence in its art design. The world is intriguing to explore and the characters deeply interesting.

Amazon

Avowed

Platforms: PC, Xbox Series X|S

Fans of something like Skyrim will find something to like with Avowed. The game plays very similar with a little more magic going on. It's classic fantasy with sword and magic.

Amazon

The Outer Worlds 2

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

Outer Worlds 2 is a sci-fi RPG that is closest to something like the Fallout series. There are ability checks, crazy characters, and an expansive universe to explore.

Amazon

Star Wars Outlaws

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5,  Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2

Star Wars Outlaws lets you explore the galaxy as a scoundrel, the archetype based on Han Solo. If you've ever wanted to be immersed in a galaxy of scum and villainy, this is it.

Amazon

DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2

This is a bundle of two classic RPGs getting a huge graphical makeover. It's history made modern and something fans of things like oldschool Final Fantasy will love.

Amazon

FINAL FANTASY TACTICS - The Ivalice Chronicles

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2

This is a classic released in its perfect form. It is a tactics RPG akin to something like Fire Emblem with a phenomenal epic fantasy story.

Amazon

Metaphor: ReFantazio

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

Our Game of the Year last year, Metaphor: ReFantazio is the pinnacle of modern turn-based RPGs. It has anime influence and one of the best narratives in gaming.

Amazon

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S

The Great Circle is like being able to play an amazing Indiana Jones movie. The characters are captured well, the humor, the adventure, and all things that make Indy great are here. It's a fantastic time.

Amazon

Anime Video Game Gift Guide 2025

Persona 3 Reload

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2

A classic RPG remade, Persona 3 Reload is a flashy new remake with great visuals and turn-based combat. It's got a great story and characters you really get to know as well.

Amazon

Promise Mascot Agency

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch

Promise Mascot Agency is a pretty crazy game about exploring a cursed Japanese town. You recruit mascot friends that come help you out of binds to solve the mystery of what's going on.

Humble Bundle

Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S

The Like a Dragon series is known for its whacky humor, beat em up combat, and amazing worlds to explore. Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii is one of the craziest yet. You play as a pirate captain, with a classic pirate ship, but set during the modern day.

Amazon

Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter

Platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2

A reimagining of a classic with new visuals and gameplay, this is a story heavy RPG that lays the foundation for one of the most expansive RPG series in gaming. It's great for newcomers and veterans of RPGs alike.

Amazon

item.title: Darrington Press Announces Daggerheart: Hope & Fear, its First Official Expansion
item.content:encoded:
Darrington Press has announced pre-orders for its first official Daggerheart expansion. The expansion, Daggerheart: Hope & Fear, will introduce new rules and mechanics for both players and GMs to the bestselling, acclaimed fantasy TTRPG.

The Daggerheart: Hope & Fear Pre-Order Announcement

According to the store page, Daggerheart: Hope & Fear will provide new character-building and worldbuilding tools for your gaming table. Much like the core rulebook, this expansion will include a book, cards, and accessories. For GMs, the book will include 130 new adversaries and several new campaign frames.

The page confirms several new player classes: The Witch, Warlock, Brawler, and Assassin. The Witch is notable since the class originally showed up in The Void as playtest material. This means there is precedent for other material to make the jump to official material such as the monstrous transformations or the Daggerheart Blood Hunter, appearing in a more horror-adjacent supplement down the line.

Daggerheart: Hope & Fear will be available in two versions. The standard edition is a normal printing of the book. The deluxe edition will sport a variant cover and additional accessories. If you pre-order either version, you will receive a PDF copy two weeks before the book's full release. Both versions of the book are expected to ship Summer 2026.

Daggerheart has had a major impact in the TTRPG space. In addition to strong reviews and sales, the game has garnered a lot of industry talent, including former Dungeons & Dragons designers Chris Perkins and Jeremy Crawford, Eberron creator Keith Baker, and Phoenix Dawn Command designer Jenn Ellis. 

In addition, the game's cultural impact has only continued to expand. This can be seen with its recent collaboration with the miniature printing platform, Hero Forge, and the runaway success of the Daggerheart conversion of Dungeons of Drakkenheim.

The standard edition of Daggerheart: Hope & Fear is available at an MSRP of $39.99 not including shipping. The Deluxe Edition, which includes Fear tokens, 10 d12s, a GM screen, and a giant d20, is available for $119.99.
